content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 stone, which is now in our inventory along with the 10 coal and 10 iron ore. 
# Now we can proceed to craft the stone furnaces.

# Step 8: Craft two stone furnaces using the gathered resources.
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Coal] >= 2, "Not enough coal to fuel the furnaces."
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronOre] >= 5, "Not enough iron ore to craft the furnaces."
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Stone] >= 10, "Not enough stone to craft the furnaces."

# Craft 2 stone furnaces.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=2)  # Prepare to craft 2 stone furnaces.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display updated inventory.
